HNDI.summary: Handeni Gold Inc., a gold exploration company, explores for and develops mineral properties in the United Republic of Tanzania. It primarily owns a 100% interest in the Handeni gold project comprising four prospecting licenses covering an area of 359.9 square kilometers located in the Handeni district, within the Tanga region of the United Republic of Tanzania. The company was formerly known as Douglas Lake Minerals Inc. and changed its name to Handeni Gold Inc. in February 2012. Handeni Gold Inc. was founded in 2004 and is based in Dar es Salaam, the United Republic of Tanzania.

ORC-B.V.short_name: ORCA ENERGY GROUP INC CL B
ORC-B.V.summary: Orca Energy Group Inc. explores for, develops, produces, and sells petroleum and natural gas to the power and industrial sectors in Tanzania. It principally holds interests in the Songo Songo natural gas field located to the south of Dar Es Salaam. The company was formerly known as Orca Exploration Group Inc. and changed its name to Orca Energy Group Inc. in July 2020. Orca Energy Group Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Dar es Salaam, Tanzania.
